translated: the purity of delusion and the purity of the emptiness of all phenomena are indivisible.🔽They are not two and cannot be divided into two. They are not broken apart and are not cut apart.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽gti mug yongs su dag pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // gti mug yongs su dag pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa /
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purity of delusion is the purity of the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pas gti mug yongs su dag @363a *//
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su dag pas gti mug yongs su dag @363a *//
translated: The purity of the emptiness of defining characteristics is the purity of delusion.

original: pa ste; de ltar na /

translated: Thus,

translated: the purity of delusion and the purity of the emptiness of defining characteristics are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

analyzed: gti mug yongs su dag pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa /
translated: The purity of delusion is the purity of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pas gti mug yongs su dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of non-apprehension is the purity of delusion.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

analyzed: gti mug yongs su dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of delusion and the purity of the emptiness of non-apprehension are not two,

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,🔽the purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the perfection of generosity are not two,🔽nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.🔽The purity of the perfection of generosity is the purity of the perfection of patience.

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the perfection of patience is the purity of the perfection of generosity.🔽Thus,🔽the purity of the perfection of patience and the purity of the perfection of generosity are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // sbyin pa'i pha @369a *//
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.🔽The purity of the perfection of generosity is the purity of the perfection of vigor.

analyzed: rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: de ltar na / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus,🔽the purity of the perfection of meditation and the purity of the perfection of generosity are not two,🔽nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.🔽The purity of the perfection of generosity is the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the perfection of wisdom is the purity of the perfection of generosity.🔽Thus,🔽the purity of the perfection of wisdom and the purity of the perfection of generosity are not two,🔽nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.

original: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of inner emptiness and the purity of outer emptiness are not two,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of outer emptiness and the purity of outer and inner emptiness are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not go their separate ways.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad @369b do //

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,🔽the purity of the emptiness of the unconditioned and the purity of the emptiness of what is beyond extremes

analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of what transcends limits and the purity of the emptiness of no beginning and no end are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided, nor are they cut in half.

analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of no beginning and no end is the purity of the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of nonrepudiation is the purity of the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar @370b med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar @370b med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of emptiness that is not discarded is the purification of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purification of emptiness that is not discarded and the purification of the emptiness of inherent existence are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and are not broken apart.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: @371a *// de ltar na /
analyzed: @371a *// de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the emptiness of defining characteristics and the purity of the emptiness of nonapprehension are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: are not sundered, and are not broken apart.

analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,🔽the purity of the emptiness of nonapprehension and the purity of the emptiness of things are not two,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: are not sundered, and are not broken apart.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence is the purity of the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The emptiness of essential nature is pure, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is pure. There is no duality here,

original: gnyis @371b su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis @371b su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: no duality whatsoever, no singleness, and no multiplicity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is pure, and the applications of mindfulness are pure.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are pure, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things is pure, and the applications of mindfulness are pure. There is no duality here,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: no duality whatsoever, no singleness, and no multiplicity.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pas yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are pure, and the right efforts are pure.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the applications of mindfulness is due to the purity of the right efforts.

original: de ltar na /🔽dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purity of the applications of mindfulness and the purity of the right efforts are not two, nor are they divided.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the bases of spiritual power is due to the purity of the right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the right efforts is due to the purity of the bases of spiritual power.

original: de ltar na /🔽yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: de ltar na / yang dag par spong ba rnam par dag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: Thus,🔽the purity of the right efforts and the purity of the bases of spiritual power are not two, nor are they divided.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas dbang po rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pas dbang po rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the faculties is due to the purity of the bases of spiritual power.

original: dbang po rnam par dag pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: dbang po rnam par dag pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the bases of supernatural powers is the purity of the faculties.

original: de ltar na /🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang @372a *//
analyzed: de ltar na / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang @372a *//
translated: Thus,

original: pa rnam par dag pa dang / dbang po rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: pa rnam par dag pa dang / dbang po rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the bases of supernatural powers and the purity of the faculties are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: dbang po rnam par dag pas stobs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dbang po rnam par dag pas stobs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the faculties is the purity of the powers.

original: stobs rnam par dag pas dbang po rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: stobs rnam par dag pas dbang po rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the powers is the purity of the faculties.

original: de ltar na dbang po rnam par dag pa dang / stobs rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na dbang po rnam par dag pa dang / stobs rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus, the purity of the faculties and the purity of the powers are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: stobs rnam par dag pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: stobs rnam par dag pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the powers is the purity of the branches of enlightenment.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas stobs rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas stobs rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the branches of enlightenment is the purity of the powers.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: stobs rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: stobs rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purification of the powers and the purification of the limbs of awakening are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas lam rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pas lam rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the limbs of awakening is the purification of the path.

original: lam rnam par dag pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lam rnam par dag pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the path is the purification of the limbs of awakening.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang / lam rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa dang / lam rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: lam rnam par dag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: lam rnam par dag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the path is the purification of the noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas lam rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas lam rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the noble truths is the purification of the path.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: lam rnam par dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: lam rnam par dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purification of the path and the purification of the noble truths are indivisible.

original: gnyis @372b su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis @372b su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas bsam gtan rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pas bsam gtan rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the meditative stabilities is due to the purity of the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the noble truths is due to the purity of the meditative stabilities.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gtan rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the noble truths and the purity of the meditative stabilities are not two, nor are they divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, nor are they separable.

original: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas tshad med pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnam par dag pas tshad med pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the immeasurable is due to the purity of the meditative stabilities.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas bsam gtan rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas bsam gtan rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the meditative stabilities is due to the purity of the immeasurable.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / tshad med pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnam par dag pa dang / tshad med pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the meditative stabilities and the purity of the immeasurable are not two, nor are they divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, nor are they separable.

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the formless is due to the purity of the immeasurable.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas tshad med pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas tshad med pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the formless meditative absorptions is the purity of the immeasurable aspirations.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the immeasurable aspirations and the purity of the formless meditative absorptions are indivisible:

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: they are not two and cannot be made two.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the formless meditative absorptions is the purity of the eight aspects of liberation.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the eight aspects of liberation is the purity of the formless meditative absorptions.

original: de ltar na /🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par thar @373a *//
analyzed: de ltar na / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par thar @373a *//
translated: Thus,

original: pa brgyad rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: pa brgyad rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the formless meditative absorptions and the purity of the eight aspects of liberation are indivisible:

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: they are not two and cannot be made two.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the eight liberations is the purity of the nine serial absorptions.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the nine serial absorptions is the purity of the eight liberations.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the eight liberations and the purity of the nine serial absorptions are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: are not divided, are not broken apart, and do not become separate.🔽The purity of the nine serial absorptions is the purity of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa ste; de ltar na /
translated: The purity of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness is the purity of the nine serial absorptions. Thus,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par dag pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: and emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are pure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: In this regard, there are not two, nor are they divided.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pas mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The higher cognitions are pure because of the purity of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa @373b dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa @373b dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are pure because of the purity of the higher cognitions.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness and the purity of the higher cognitions are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the superknowledges is the purification of the meditative stabilizations.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the meditative stabilizations is the purification of the superknowledges.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purification of the superknowledges and the purification of the meditative stabilizations are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the meditative stabilizations is the purification of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the dhāraṇī gateways is the purification of the meditative stabilizations.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purification of the meditative stabilizations and the purification of the dhāraṇī gateways are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do /
translated: nor are they divided.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purification of the dhāraṇī gateways is the purification of the tathāgatas’ powers.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the dhāraṇī gateway is due to the purity of the tathāgatas’ powers.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the dhāraṇī gateway and the purity of the tathāgatas’ powers are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor are they divided.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs @374a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pas mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas de bzhin gshegs @374a *//
translated: The purity of the tathāgatas’ fearlessnesses is due to the purity of the tathāgatas’ powers.

original: pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the tathāgatas’ powers is due to the purity of the tathāgatas’ fearlessnesses.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the tathāgatas’ powers and the purity of the tathāgatas’ fearlessnesses are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do /
translated: nor are they divided.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the correct understandings is due to the purity of the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of fearlessness is due to the purification of the correct knowledges.

original: de ltar na /🔽mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na / mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: the purification of fearlessness and the purification of the correct knowledges are not two, nor are they divided.🔽The purification of the Buddha-dharmas is due to the purification of the correct knowledges.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pas so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purification of the correct knowledges is due to the purification of the Buddha-dharmas.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purification of the correct knowledges and the purification of the Buddha-dharmas are not two, nor are they divided.

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam par dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /

analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pas lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /

analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /

translated: The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of consciousness are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the constituents are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the sense fields are not two and are not divided.

translated: The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the perfection of giving are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the perfection of morality are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the perfection of patience are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the perfection of perseverance are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the perfection of concentration are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the perfection of wisdom are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not two and are not divided.

translated: The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the sensory element of the body, the sensory element of tangibles, and the sensory element of tactile consciousness are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the sensory element of the mental faculty, the sensory element of mental phenomena, and the sensory element of mental consciousness are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the applications of mindfulness are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the right efforts are not two and cannot be divided into two.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the legs of miraculous power are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the faculties are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the powers are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the limbs of awakening are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the path are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the ten powers are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the four fearlessnesses are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the four detailed and thorough knowledges are not two and cannot be divided into two.🔽The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not two and cannot be divided into two.

translated: The purity of the perfection of concentration and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and cannot be divided into two.

translated: It is indivisible, not to be divided into two.

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of meditative stability being pure, the tactile sensations that arise from contact with the body are pure.

translated: Thus,

analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma @386a *// yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability being pure and the tactile sensations that arise from contact with the body being pure are indivisible, not to be divided into two, and are not something that can be differentiated.

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of meditative stability being pure, the tactile sensations that arise from contact with the mind are pure.

translated: The purity of the perfection of perseverance and the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body are not two, nor are they divided into two, nor do they drip , and they are not cut off.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance and the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body are not two, nor are they divided into two, nor do they drip , and they are not cut off.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance and the purity of the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body are not two, nor are they divided into two, nor do they drip , and they are not cut off.🔽The purity of the perfection of perseverance

translated: The perfection of perseverance is pure, and the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is mentally produced is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: In this way, purity is not dual and is not not dual.

translated: The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the union of eye and form are indivisible.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the union of ear and sound are indivisible.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa; rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa🔽ste / de ltar na /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa; rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the union of nose and smell are indivisible.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the union of tongue and taste are indivisible.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the union of body and touch are indivisible.🔽The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the conditioned arising of contact through the union of mind and mental phenomena are indivisible.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: It is not two, nor is it divided, nor is it cut asunder.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of morality being pure, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is pure.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact being pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the perfection of morality being pure and the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact being pure, the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: gnyis su byar med @402a *//
analyzed: gnyis su byar med @402a *//
translated: In this there is no duality,

original: so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: nor is it not nondual.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of morality being pure, the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is pure.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the tongue, the purity of the sense field of tastes, the purity of the sense field of tongue consciousness, the purity of the sense field of the tongue’s contact-based feeling, and the purity of the sense field of the tongue’s contact-based craving are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects is something else.🔽The purity of the sense field of the body, the purity of the sense field of tangibles, the purity of the sense field of body consciousness, the purity of the sense field of the body’s contact-based feeling, and the purity of the sense field of the body’s contact-based craving are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects is something else.🔽The purity of the sense field of the mind, the purity of the sense field of mental phenomena, the purity of the sense field of mind consciousness, the purity of the sense field of the mind’s contact-based feeling, and the purity of the sense field of the mind’s contact-based craving are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects is something else.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the eye, the purity of the sense field of visual form, the purity of the sense field of eye consciousness, the purity of the sense field of the eye’s contact-based feeling, and the purity of the sense field of the eye’s contact-based craving are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects is something else.🔽The purity of the sense field of the ear, the purity of the sense field of sounds, the purity of the sense field of ear consciousness, the purity of the sense field of the ear’s contact-based feeling, and the purity of the sense field of the ear’s contact-based craving are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects is something else.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /
translated: The purity of the sense field of the nose, the purity of the sense field of smells, the purity of the sense field of nose consciousness, the purity of the sense field of the nose’s contact-based feeling, and the purity of the sense field of the nose’s contact-based craving are one thing, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects is something else.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the sensation arisen from the condition of contact with the body are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the perfection of morality and the purity of the sensation arisen from the condition of contact with the mental faculty are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag ba ste /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag ba ste /
translated: The purity of the sensation arisen from the condition of contact with the mental faculty and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two, nor are they divided, nor are they otherwise.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: tshul khrims @402b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: tshul khrims @402b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: The perfection of morality is pure, and the feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact by means of the mind is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.🔽In this way, there is no duality,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and there is no non-duality.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of generosity is pure, and form is pure,

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,🔽the perfection of generosity is pure, and form is pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: In this way, there is no duality,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: and there is no non-duality.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas tshor ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of generosity is pure, and feeling is pure,🔽and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: tshor ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of feeling is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la /🔽gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la / gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the perfection of giving, the purity of feeling, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects🔽are not two and are not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas 'du shes rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of perception is the purity of the perfection of giving.

original: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of perception is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa /🔽@403a *// 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du shes rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa / @403a *// 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the perfection of giving, the purity of perception, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects🔽are not two and are not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not separated, and not cut apart.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas 'du byed rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of generosity is pure, and thus volitional factors are pure.

original: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Volitional factors are pure, and thus the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / 'du byed rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the perfection of generosity is pure, volitional factors are pure, and the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: In this there is no duality, and no discrimination can be made.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of generosity is pure, and thus consciousness is pure.

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: Consciousness is pure, and thus the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /🔽gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de / gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas mig rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of consciousness are not two and are not divided.

original: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /🔽de ltar na /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: mig rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste / de ltar na / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / mig rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: The purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of the eye are not two and are not divided.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas rna ba rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.🔽The purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of the ear are not two and are not divided.

original: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @403b nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: rna ba rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @403b nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the ear is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / rna ba rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the perfection of giving, the purity of the ear, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not different.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa /
translated: The purity of the perfection of giving is the purity of the nose.

original: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: sna rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the nose is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / sna rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the perfection of giving, the purity of the nose, and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two and are not divided.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not broken apart, not different.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lce rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lce rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of generosity is pure, and because of that the tongue is pure.

original: lce rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lce rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The tongue is pure, and because of that the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: de ltar na / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lce rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: Thus,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: the purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of the tongue and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible, not two, and do not differentiate.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa /
translated: The perfection of generosity is pure, and because of that the body is pure.

original: lus rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: lus rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The body is pure, and because of that the knowledge of all aspects is pure.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / lus rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of the body and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are indivisible, not two, and do not differentiate.

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do //
translated: They are not two, nor are they divided.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa /🔽yid rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad @404a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa / yid rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad @404a *//
translated: The purity of generosity is the purity of the mind.

original: mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of the mind is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa dang / yid rnam par dag pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di la gnyis su med de /
translated: the purity of the perfection of generosity and the purity of the mind and the purity of the knowledge of all aspects are not two,

original: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do; ;sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: gnyis su byar med so so ma yin tha mi dad do; ;sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa /
translated: nor are they divided. The purity of the perfection of generosity is the purity of form.

original: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dag pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
translated: The purity of form is the purity of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: Thus,
